abstract: Biogen Idec, the biotechnology company, said on Monday that it had come to an agreement with the billionaire investor Carl Icahn under which Mr. Icahn would abandon his threatened proxy fight in return for Biogen’s acceptance of a nominee to its board, Reuters reported.
snippet: Biogen Idec, the biotechnology company, said on Monday that it had come to an agreement with the billionaire investor Carl Icahn under which Mr. Icahn would abandon his threatened proxy fight in return for Biogen’s acceptance of a nominee to its b...
lead_paragraph: Biogen Idec, the biotechnology company, said on Monday that it had come to an agreement with the billionaire investor Carl Icahn under which Mr. Icahn would abandon his threatened proxy fight in return for Biogen’s acceptance of a nominee to its board, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Biogen Accepts a Third Icahn Supporter on Its Board
